fields.title: Junior Software Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Assist in the development and maintenance of embedded software applications. Perform basic testing and debugging tasks to ensure software quality. Collaborate with senior engineers to learn and grow technical skills, gaining hands-on experience in real-world projects. Document code and processes for future reference, ensuring clarity and maintainability. Participate in team meetings and contribute ideas for improvement, fostering a collaborative environment. Stay updated with the latest technologies and trends in software development. Support the team in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues. Engage in continuous learning to enhance technical expertise and contribute to the success of the team.
fields.requirement: Higher diploma or bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related fields. Basic knowledge of C/C++ programming and a willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies. Strong communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with team members. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply, as on-the-job training will be provided. A proactive attitude and eagerness to take on challenges. Familiarity with software development lifecycle and debugging tools is a plus. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

fields.title: Senior Software Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Lead the design and development of complex embedded software systems. Mentor junior engineers and provide technical guidance to enhance their skills. Optimize software performance and ensure system reliability through rigorous testing and debugging. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions that meet project requirements. Stay updated on industry trends and implement best practices to maintain a competitive edge. Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices. Provide technical documentation and support for software solutions. Participate in stakeholder meetings to align project goals with business objectives.
fields.requirement: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related disciplines. 5+ years of experience in embedded software development with a proven track record of successful projects. Proficiency in C/C++ and Python programming, with strong debugging and analytical skills. Strong problem-solving and leadership skills to guide teams and address technical challenges. Experience with AI and machine learning is a plus. Familiarity with real-time operating systems and hardware interfaces such as UART, SPI, and I2C. Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

fields.title: Embedded Systems Developer
fields.responsibilities: Develop and implement embedded software for IoT devices, ensuring high performance and reliability. Conduct system integration and testing to validate functionality and compatibility. Troubleshoot and resolve software issues to maintain system stability. Work closely with hardware engineers to ensure seamless integration and compatibility between hardware and software components. Provide technical support and documentation to assist in product development and maintenance. Optimize software for resource efficiency, including memory and power consumption. Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to incorporate innovative solutions into projects. Participate in team meetings and contribute to the overall success of the development process.
fields.requirement: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related fields. 3+ years of experience in embedded systems development with a strong understanding of microcontrollers and real-time operating systems. Proficiency in C/C++ programming and familiarity with debugging tools and techniques. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze and resolve complex technical challenges. Familiarity with IoT protocols and technologies such as MQTT, CoAP, or Zigbee is an advantage. Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. A proactive attitude and eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies.

fields.title: Firmware Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Design and develop firmware for embedded systems, ensuring compliance with industry standards and performance benchmarks. Perform code optimization and ensure efficient resource utilization to enhance system performance. Conduct firmware testing and validation to identify and resolve issues. Collaborate with hardware and software teams to meet project requirements and ensure seamless integration. Maintain and update existing firmware as needed to address issues and improve functionality. Document firmware development processes, including code, testing procedures, and best practices. Stay updated with the latest advancements in firmware development and incorporate innovative techniques. Participate in team meetings and contribute to the overall success of the development process.
fields.requirement: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related disciplines. 2+ years of experience in firmware development with a strong focus on embedded systems. Proficiency in C/C++ programming and familiarity with hardware interfaces such as UART, SPI, and I2C. Strong debugging and analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Familiarity with version control systems and debugging tools is a plus. A proactive attitude and commitment to delivering high-quality firmware solutions. Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and tools.

fields.title: software engineer
fields.responsibilities:
Design and develop embedded software applications and firmware for various hardware platforms
    Perform testing and debugging to ensure the reliability and performance of embedded systems
    Work with AI in software development life cycle
    Work independently and as part of a team to deliver solutions
    Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the embedded systems industry
fields.requirement:
Bachelor’s degree or higher diploma in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer   Engineering or related disciplines
    Experience in embedded application development
    Excel in C/C++, Python programming
    Fast learner, self-motivated, passionate and good team player
    Excellent communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills
    Experience in AI model training & AI assisted development is highly desirable

fields.title: software engineer
fields.responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and debug embedded software applications and firmware for various hardware platforms.

• Apply software design principles, such as modularity, encapsulation, and abstraction, to create scalable and maintainable software solutions.

• Leverage media technology to develop embedded software solutions for multimedia applications, such as audio/video processing and streaming.

• Perform low-level programming, including device drivers, peripheral interfaces, and system initialization.

• Conduct hardware-software integration and testing to ensure seamless functionality and compatibility.
fields.requirement:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or the related ones.
Bachelor's degree with 3-5 years or Master's degree with 1-3 years of experience in developing embedded software using C/C++.
Understanding of software and hardware interfaces, familiar with at least one RTOS. Experience in device driver development is a plus.

fields.title: Embedded Software Development Lead
fields.responsibilities:
Analyses, designs, tests, codes, secures, debugs, modifies, deploys, integrates and maintains (system) software enhancements, test environment and/or new software to have an impact on the product and solutions direction and customer experience.

•Uses state-of-the-art technologies and practices to drive superior customer value. Interacts with users/ product owners to define/ adjust requirements and/or necessary modifications.

•Keeps abreast of technical developments and practices in own field through literature, courses/trainings, technical contacts, and competitive environment, all to ensure the development of great customer digital solutions.
fields.requirement:
Master or PhD in Software or Electronics engineering

•Solid Experience (>5 years) in working from new ​product development to life cycle sustaining engineering and quality improvement projects.

•Ability to collaborate with a wide range of professionals in matrix organization & lead through influence​, both internally and externally with suppliers/partners.

•Solid experience in Software development (>5 years), from Firmware to Cloud and Mobile App types of use cases for B2C IoT devices such as Connected Baby Video Monitor, Vital Sign Monitors, etc.

•Programming languages & paradigms, methodologies and techniques. Lean / Agile / SAFe.

•Very familiar with product development process waterfall type and V-model as PDLM.

•Fluency in Chinese Mandarin and/or Cantonese written/spoken is a must, next fluency in English written/spoken.

fields.title: EMBEDDED SOFTWARE ENGINEER ( HONG KONG BASE )
fields.responsibilities:
Responsible for handling software development in 4bit/8bit/16bit/32bit

Microcontroller including programming, debugging, performance testing and project follow-up of electrical safety device and consumer products.

Write efficient, scalable, and maintainable code using appropriate programming languages and tools

Optimize embedded software for performance, power consumption, and resource utilization

Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure the quality and reliability of the software

Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the embedded software industry

Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members
fields.requirement:
Diploma graduate or above in Electronic or Computer Engineering or related discipline

At least 2 years of experience in MCU embedded software programming

Candidates with less experience or fresh graduates will be considered as Junior Embedded Software Engineer with training provide

Candidates with more experience will be considered as Senior Embedded Software Engineer

Good Command of English & Mandarin

Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment

fields.title: Electronic Hardware Engineer
fields.responsibilities:
•Responsible for testing and evaluating performance of WiFi access points or routers.

•Project support for the new WiFi products during EVT/DVT and PVT.

•Conduct indoor/outdoor field testings to verify performance.

•Carry out data analysis of the measurement results.
fields.requirement:
•High Cert/High Diploma/Bachelor degree in Electronic Engineering or equivalent.

•3 to 5 years experience of electronic products development.

•Fresh graduate is also welcome for those who have passion for hardware development.

•Hands-on experience with prototyping/testing of wireless electronic hardware is preferred.

•Hands-on experience with test equipment such as oscilloscope, DVM and RF communication equipment is preferred.

•       Programming experience for embedded environment such as RPi/Arduino or other SBC is a plus;

•       Knowledge of WiFi is preferred but on-job training will be provided; 

•       Good command of English, Chinese and PTH

fields.title: Electronic Engineer
fields.responsibilities: • Design and develop electronic product circuits, ensuring compliance with industry standards and performance benchmarks. • Work on embedded MCU programming and debugging to enhance product functionality. • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate hardware and software components seamlessly. • Conduct testing, troubleshooting, and optimization to ensure product reliability and efficiency. • Document technical specifications, processes, and best practices for future reference. • Stay updated with emerging technologies and trends to incorporate innovative solutions into projects. • Participate in team meetings and provide technical insights to improve product quality and development processes.
fields.requirement: • Proficient in C-programming with a strong foundation in embedded systems development. • Graduate in Computer Engineering / Electronic Engineering with relevant academic knowledge. • Experience in assembly programming, debugging, and developing products such as thermostats, GUI scripting (e.g., LVGL), or app design (e.g., Flutter). • Familiarity with wireless communication protocols like Wi-Fi, BLE, LoRaWAN, or Zigbee. • Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS or Thingsboard is a plus. • Experience in embedded Linux product development is highly desirable. • Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a proactive attitude to address technical challenges effectively.

fields.title: Programmer / Senior Programmer
fields.responsibilities:
End-to-end system development from requirement collections, feasibility study, system design, implementation, to system deployment
    Perform quality assurance on project deliverable
    Support and facilitate Project Manager in planning, executing, monitoring and reporting to ensure project success
fields.requirement:
HD or above in Computer Science or IT related disciplines

    For Senior Analyst Programmer min 4 years of IT experience

    JAVA, Spring, Spring boot or,
    .NET 
    JavaScript / PHP 
    React.js, Node.js
    C/C++
    React native / Flutter
    Swift / Kotlin / Java(Mobile)

fields.title: Analyst Programmer / Senior Programmer
fields.responsibilities:
Provide business-process automation and IT solutions to overseas branches
    Focus on system development/maintenance/technical support
    Participate in the technical solutions, programs coding and implementations
    Involve in new core banking system implementations
    Provide applications training to end users
fields.requirement:
Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines 
    Skillful technique on developing IT solutions to meet our business needs and enhancing our systems
    A positive, 'can-do' working attitude, and an active self-starter character that will continuously add values to own responsibilities
    Good understanding of system documentation and familiar with SDLC
    2 to 3 years development experience on C# / VB.net, ASP.net, Java, JavaScript, MS SQL, Oracle and any web based applications
    Good hands-on knowledge on Windows, Unix, or Linux platform is a definite advantage
    General banking, Treasury and Trade Finance systems knowledge is a plus but no compulsory
    Proficient in English & Chinese

fields.title: Computer Vision Engineer
fields.responsibilities:
Develop Computer Vision products and solutions to enable semiconductor world
    On-job training will be provided to master computer vision technology
    Work as a team and cooperate with different R&D teams
    Implement computer vision software and design inspection algorithm
    Opportunity to design computer vision and imaging system
    Algorithm prove-of-concept and capability enhancement
fields.requirement:
Bachelor Degree or above in Computer Engineering / Computer Science / Electronic Engineering / Information Engineering or relevant disciplines
    Experience in C/C++ programming
    Passion in research and development
    Interested in problem solving

 

Attractive salary and fringe benefits package will be offered to the right candidates.

Please visit our company website for our company background, products and other useful information.
Website: https://www.asmpt.com/

fields.title: Control Engineer / Senior Control Engineer
fields.responsibilities:
Focus on electro-mechanical system motion and process control
    Develop advanced motion control algorithm to achieve submicron precision motion
    Develop the machine diagnostic and prognostic mechanisms for mechatronic system
    Improve the process performance of semiconductor packaging machinery
fields.requirement:
Bachelor/ Master/ PhD Degree with specialization in Electrical, Mechanical, Automation, Mechatronics, or relevant disciplines
    Control engineering fundamentals in classical and modern control methodologies
    Enjoy tackling technical challenges of providing creative solutions to complex engineering system
    Candidate possesses one or more of the following competencies is preferred:
        Hands-on experience in time domain and frequency domain instrumentation, e.g. scope, dynamic signal analyzers, modal analysis, laser sensors, accelerometer, etc.; or
        Familiar with system analysis and system modeling, particularly mechanical servo, system dynamics, vibration, thermal process, motor, sensors and drive system; or
        Experience in robust control and adaptive control; or
        Proficient in MATLAB, C/C++ and real-time computer system; or
        Experience in machine learning and data analysis.
    A good hands-on problem solver, with analytical mind and attention to details
    Good command of English is a must
    Good command of Mandarin is preferred

 

Attractive salary and fringe benefits package will be offered to the right candidates.

Please visit our company website for our company background, products and other useful information.
Website: https://www.asmpt.com/

fields.title: Electrical Engineer (Fresh Graduate / IANG Holder Is Welcome)
fields.responsibilities: Design and development of electrical power systems for electrical machines, ensuring compliance with safety and industry standards. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate electrical systems into machine designs. Conduct power estimation and load analysis to optimize system performance. Perform testing and troubleshooting of electrical components to ensure reliability and efficiency. Prepare technical documentation, including schematics and specifications, for future reference. Stay updated with the latest advancements in electrical engineering to incorporate innovative solutions. Provide technical support during the production and installation phases, ensuring seamless implementation. Participate in team meetings and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering or relevant disciplines. Strong understanding of electrical power system design for industrial machines, including safety considerations. Experience in power estimation and load analysis for machine systems. Familiarity with electrical standards and regulations. Proficiency in using design tools such as AutoCAD or similar software. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Candidates with extensive experience and in-depth knowledge in electrical system design will be considered for senior positions. Fresh graduates and IANG holders are welcome to apply.

fields.title: Full Stack Web Developer
fields.responsibilities:
Participate in innovative Cloud-based Applications Development for Hotels, Theme Parks, and Restaurants
    Develop Cloud API for partners and customers to build their own app to integrate to our cloud infrastructure
    Develop E-Commerce Mobile Applications for our Cloud-based Applications
    Performance testing and optimization in APIs
    Work as a team to contribute on tertiary level application support for global implementations
    Work on Agile Scrum Development methodology

Bachelor Degree holder in Computer Science or related disciplines
    Experience in PHP Framework e.g. CakePHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Symfony or Yii is a plus
    Experience in React, Vue.js, Angular or jQuery is a plus
    Experience in MySQL, SQLServer or any RDBMS is a plus
    Experience in RESTful API and/or web services development is a plus
    Experience in Mobile App development (Swift, Flutter) is a plus
    Knowledge in Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform, or other IaaS cloud service providers is a plus
    Self-motivated, good team player and strong sense of responsibility
    Good command of both spoken and written English and Chinese. Mandarin is an advantage
    More experienced candidate can be considered as Senior Full Stack Web Developer

fields.title: Assistant IT Engineer
fields.location: Tai Kok Tsui, Yau Tsim Mong District
fields.responsibilities:
Conduct requirement study, analysis & design, prepare documentation and co-ordinate with users, technical and operations teams
Lead the analyst programmers/programmers by providing guidelines and assistance to enable solution development and implementation, with passion to be hands-on with coding
Develop and maintain application programs
Prepare test plan, test cases/scripts, test environments, data and perform testing
Support user acceptance testing and system implementation
Prepare system and operations documents
Provide ongoing user and application support
fields.requirement:
Degree holder in Computer Science, Information Technology or related disciplines
A minimum of 1-2 years’ experience in IT profession
Knowledgeable and experienced in design, programming and microservices
Proficiency in Java, J2EE, AngularJS , JavaScript, XML, JSON, Oracle/MySQL, Unix
Knowledgeable in ReactJS is advantageous
Effective verbal and written communication in English and Chinese
With passion in technology forefront, such as microservices, DevOps, RPA and Customer Experience
Good analytical, inter-personal and problem solving skills
Good team player, positive attitude, innovative, self-initiating, eager to learn and share with other team members, hardworking, able to work under pressure and work independently
Candidates with less qualification and experience will be considered as Analyst Programmer or Programmer
Experience in BRM 7.3 and 12 is advantageous

fields.title: Backend Developer
fields.responsibilities: Develop and maintain backend services and APIs to support various applications. Optimize database queries to ensure high performance and data integrity. Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements seamlessly with backend logic. Troubleshoot and debug backend issues, ensuring system reliability and stability. Stay updated with the latest backend technologies and best practices to implement innovative solutions. Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and consistency. Contribute to the design and architecture of scalable backend systems. Provide technical support and guidance to junior team members when needed.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related fields. Proficiency in Python, Java, or Node.js for backend development. Experience with relational and NoSQL databases, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval. Strong problem-solving skills to address complex technical challenges. Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus. Familiarity with version control systems like Git. Ability to work in a collaborative team environment and communicate effectively. A proactive approach to learning and adapting to new technologies and tools.

fields.title: Frontend Developer
fields.responsibilities: Design and implement user-friendly web interfaces that provide an excellent user experience. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to ensure seamless integration of visual elements with backend logic. Optimize web applications for maximum speed, scalability, and responsiveness across various devices and browsers. Ensure cross-browser compatibility and address any inconsistencies. Maintain and improve existing frontend codebase, refactoring and enhancing features as needed. Stay updated with the latest frontend technologies and frameworks to implement innovative solutions. Participate in code reviews to maintain high-quality standards. Provide technical support and troubleshooting for frontend-related issues.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related fields. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js for frontend development. Experience with responsive design principles to create mobile-friendly applications. Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for design aesthetics. Knowledge of version control systems like Git for collaborative development. Familiarity with frontend build tools and package managers. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet project deadlines. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

fields.title: Data Scientist
fields.responsibilities: Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights that drive business decisions. Build predictive models and machine learning algorithms to solve complex problems. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into data-driven solutions. Visualize data and present findings to non-technical audiences in a clear and concise manner. Stay updated with the latest data science trends and tools to implement innovative techniques. Conduct data preprocessing and cleaning to ensure data quality and accuracy. Develop and maintain data pipelines for efficient data processing. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior data scientists.
fields.requirement: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related fields. Proficiency in Python, R, and SQL for data analysis and modeling. Experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address complex challenges. Knowledge of big data tools like Hadoop or Spark is a plus. Familiarity with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Excellent communication skills to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

fields.title: DevOps Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to streamline development and deployment processes. Monitor and maintain cloud infrastructure to ensure high availability, performance, and security. Automate deployment processes to improve efficiency and reduce manual intervention. Collaborate with development teams to enhance system reliability and scalability. Ensure security and compliance of systems by implementing best practices and conducting regular audits.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related fields. Experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud, including architecture and services. Proficiency in scripting languages like Bash or Python and containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes. Strong troubleshooting skills to address infrastructure challenges. Familiarity with DevOps tools and methodologies is a plus. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

fields.title: Mobile App Developer
fields.responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms, ensuring high performance and usability. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to create seamless user experiences. Optimize applications for performance, responsiveness, and compatibility across devices. Debug and resolve application issues to maintain system stability. Stay updated with the latest mobile development trends, frameworks, and tools to implement innovative solutions.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related fields. Proficiency in Swift, Kotlin, or Flutter for mobile application development. Experience with mobile app deployment processes and app store guidelines. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail to address technical challenges. Knowledge of mobile UI/UX design principles and familiarity with version control systems like Git is a plus.

fields.title: System Administrator
fields.responsibilities: Manage and maintain company servers, networks, and IT infrastructure to ensure reliability and performance. Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement solutions to minimize downtime. Ensure data security, backup processes, and disaster recovery plans are in place. Install and configure software, hardware, and network devices to support business operations. Provide technical support to employees and address IT-related queries.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related fields. Experience with Windows and Linux servers, networking protocols, and tools. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail to address technical challenges. Certification in system administration is a plus. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Familiarity with system monitoring tools and backup solutions is preferred.

fields.title: UI/UX Designer
fields.responsibilities: Design user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications, ensuring a seamless user experience. Conduct user research, usability testing, and analyze feedback to improve designs. Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups to visualize design concepts. Collaborate with developers to ensure accurate implementation of designs. Stay updated with the latest design trends, tools, and technologies to deliver innovative solutions.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or related fields with a strong understanding of user-centered design principles. Proficiency in design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD. Strong portfolio showcasing previous design work and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Knowledge of responsive design and accessibility standards is a plus.

fields.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases to ensure software quality and reliability. Identify, document, and report software defects, collaborating with developers to resolve them effectively. Perform regression testing to ensure new features do not impact existing functionality. Conduct manual and automated testing to improve efficiency and coverage. Document testing procedures, results, and best practices for future reference.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related fields with a strong foundation in software testing. Experience with manual and automated testing tools like Selenium or JUnit. Strong attention to detail and analytical skills to identify and resolve issues. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Familiarity with version control systems like Git is a plus.

fields.title: Software Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Develop and maintain software applications to meet business requirements and user needs. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and product managers, to deliver high-quality solutions. Ensure software quality through rigorous testing, debugging, and code reviews. Document software processes, updates, and best practices for future reference. Stay updated with the latest technologies and methodologies to implement innovative solutions. Optimize application performance and scalability to enhance user experience. Participate in Agile development processes, including sprint planning and daily stand-ups. Provide technical support and troubleshooting for software-related issues.
fields.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related fields with a strong foundation in programming. Proficiency in Java, Python, or C++ for software development. Experience with Agile methodologies and version control systems like Git. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to address complex technical challenges. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with diverse teams. Familiarity with software development lifecycle and best practices. A proactive attitude and eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies. Knowledge of cloud platforms and APIs is a plus.

Conduct manual and automated testing to improve efficiency and coverage. Document testing procedures, results, and best practices for future reference. Install and configure software, hardware, and network devices to support business operations. Document system configurations, processes, and best practices for future reference. fields.title: Network Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Design and implement network solutions to meet business requirements, ensuring scalability and reliability. Monitor and maintain network performance, identifying and resolving issues proactively to minimize downtime. Troubleshoot and resolve complex network issues, collaborating with cross-functional teams when necessary. Ensure network security and compliance with organizational policies and industry standards. Collaborate with IT teams to support infrastructure needs and optimize network performance. Document network configurations, processes, and best practices for future reference. Familiarity with hardware interfaces such as UART, SPI, and I2C. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Knowledge of version control systems and debugging tools is a plus. A proactive attitude and commitment to delivering high-quality firmware solutions. Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and tools.

fields.title: Junior Web Developer
fields.responsibilities: Develop and maintain responsive web applications that meet user requirements. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to ensure seamless integration of visual elements and functionality. Optimize web applications for performance, usability, and cross-browser compatibility. Debug and resolve application issues to maintain system stability. Stay updated with the latest web development trends, frameworks, and tools to implement innovative solutions. Document development processes and best practices for future reference. Participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality standards. Assist in creating user-friendly interfaces that enhance user experience.
fields.requirement: Diploma or above in Computer Science or related fields. Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong understanding of responsive design principles. Willingness to learn and adapt to new web development technologies and tools. Strong communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Attention to detail and a proactive attitude to address challenges. Familiarity with version control systems like Git is a plus. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply and will receive on-the-job training. Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines.

fields.title: Mobile App Tester
fields.responsibilities: Test mobile applications for functionality, usability, and performance across various devices and platforms. Identify, document, and report bugs and issues to the development team. Collaborate with developers to resolve issues and ensure application quality. Perform regression testing to verify that fixes do not introduce new issues. Create and execute test cases to validate application features. Stay updated with the latest testing tools and methodologies. Document testing procedures, results, and best practices for future reference. Provide feedback to improve the overall user experience of mobile applications.
fields.requirement: Diploma or above in IT or related fields. Experience in mobile app testing is a plus, but not mandatory. Strong attention to detail and analytical skills to identify and resolve issues. Good communication skills to collaborate effectively with developers and stakeholders. Knowledge of testing tools and methodologies is preferred. Willingness to learn and adapt to new testing tools and practices. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply and will receive training.

fields.title: IT Support Specialist
fields.responsibilities: Provide technical support to end-users by addressing hardware and software issues promptly and effectively. Assist in system upgrades, maintenance, and troubleshooting to ensure smooth IT operations. Document technical solutions, procedures, and best practices for future reference. Collaborate with the IT team to improve support services and enhance system reliability. Conduct basic training sessions for end-users to improve their understanding of IT systems. Monitor IT systems to identify potential issues and resolve them proactively. Stay updated with the latest IT trends and tools to provide innovative solutions.
fields.requirement: Diploma or above in IT or related fields with a strong foundation in IT systems and networks. Basic knowledge of hardware troubleshooting, software installation, and system maintenance. Strong problem-solving and communication skills to address user concerns effectively. Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and tools. Proficiency in English and Chinese for effective communication. Familiarity with IT support tools and ticketing systems is a plus. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

fields.title: Database Developer
fields.responsibilities: Design and develop efficient database solutions to meet business requirements. Optimize database performance by analyzing and fine-tuning queries and indexes. Ensure data security, integrity, and compliance with organizational policies. Collaborate with developers to integrate databases seamlessly into applications. Document database structures, processes, and best practices for future reference. Conduct regular database maintenance and backups to ensure data availability. Stay updated with the latest database technologies and trends to implement innovative solutions.
fields.requirement: Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines with a strong understanding of database design principles. Proficiency in MS SQL, Oracle, and other database management systems. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address complex database challenges. Knowledge of database optimization techniques and performance tuning. Proficiency in English and Chinese for effective communication. Familiarity with database security best practices and compliance standards. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a dynamic environment.

fields.responsibilities: Develop and maintain responsive web applications that meet user requirements. Optimize web applications for performance, usability, and cross-browser compatibility. Debug and resolve application issues to maintain system stability. Stay updated with the latest web development trends, frameworks, and tools to implement innovative solutions. Document development processes and best practices for future reference. fields.title: Mobile App Developer
fields.responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms. Collaborate with designers and backend developers to create seamless user experiences. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail to address technical challenges. Proficiency in English and Chinese for effective communication. fields.title: System Administrator
fields.responsibilities: Manage and maintain company servers, networks, and IT infrastructure. Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues to ensure reliability. Ensure data security, backup processes, and disaster recovery plans are in place. Install and configure software, hardware, and network devices. Provide technical support to employees and resolve IT-related queries. Document system configurations, processes, and best practices for future reference. Stay updated with the latest IT trends and tools to implement innovative solutions.
fields.requirement: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology or related fields with a strong foundation in system administration. Experience with Windows and Linux servers, networking protocols, and tools. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail to address technical challenges. Proficiency in English and Chinese for effective communication. Familiarity with system monitoring tools and backup solutions is a plus. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a dynamic environment. Certification in system administration is preferred.

fields.title: Quality Assurance Tester
fields.responsibilities: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases to ensure software quality. Identify, document, and report software defects and collaborate with developers to resolve them. Perform regression testing to ensure new features do not impact existing functionality. Automate testing processes where possible to improve efficiency. Document testing procedures, results, and best practices for future reference. Stay updated with the latest testing tools and methodologies to implement innovative solutions. Participate in team meetings and contribute to improving the overall quality assurance process.
fields.requirement: Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines with a strong foundation in software testing. Experience with manual and automated testing tools like Selenium or JUnit. Strong attention to detail and analytical skills to identify and resolve issues. Proficiency in English and Chinese for effective communication. Familiarity with version control systems like Git is a plus. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Knowledge of software development lifecycle and testing methodologies is preferred.

fields.title: Network Engineer
fields.responsibilities: Design and implement network solutions to meet business requirements, ensuring scalability and reliability. Monitor and maintain network performance, identifying and resolving issues proactively to minimize downtime. Troubleshoot and resolve complex network issues, collaborating with cross-functional teams when necessary. Ensure network security and compliance with organizational policies and industry standards. Collaborate with IT teams to support infrastructure needs and optimize network performance. Document network configurations, processes, and best practices for future reference. Stay updated with the latest networking technologies and trends to implement innovative solutions. Provide technical support and training to team members as needed.
fields.requirement: Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines with a strong foundation in networking. Proven experience with network protocols, tools, and technologies. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address complex network challenges. Proficient in English and Chinese for effective communication. Familiarity with network monitoring tools and troubleshooting techniques. Certification in networking (e.g., CCNA, CCNP) is a plus. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a dynamic environment.

fields.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
fields.responsibilities: Monitor and respond to security incidents, ensuring timely resolution to minimize risks. Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to identify and address potential security threats. Implement security measures, policies, and best practices to safeguard organizational assets. Provide training and awareness programs on cybersecurity best practices to employees. Stay updated with the latest security trends, tools, and technologies to enhance the organization's security posture. Collaborate with IT teams to ensure compliance with security standards and regulations. Document security incidents, processes, and solutions for future reference. Participate in security audits and recommend improvements to strengthen defenses.
fields.requirement: Bachelor Degree in Cybersecurity or related fields with a strong understanding of security principles. Knowledge of security tools, protocols, and frameworks. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address complex security challenges. Certification in cybersecurity (e.g., CISSP, CEH) is a plus. Proficient in English and Chinese for effective communication. Familiarity with incident response processes and vulnerability management. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Experience in conducting security assessments and implementing security measures is preferred. A proactive attitude and eagerness to stay updated with emerging threats and technologies.

fields.title: Junior Backend Developer
